short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get easiest way to download aliexpress product images and videos to use them for your dropshipping business.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download all of the compressed AliExpress product photos and videos with only one click.

With just one click, you can download your drop shipping company's main images, description images, variant images, and feedback images using this plugin, which is free.


Key attributes:-

1. Download button for all photos, including the main image, the description image, and any alternate images or videos
2. A download button for all of the description's photographs and videos
3. A download button for all alternative photos and movies
4. Download all product pictures and videos button
5. Download all of the feedback's photographs and videos button

How to Download Product Images from AliExpress with AliSaver Plus:
1. Pin the extension to your browser by clicking the "Add to Chrome" button.
2. Visit a product page on AliExpress.com.
3. Select the download links located above the product photos.

N.B:
Once you've used our plugin, you can give it five stars Ali Saver Plus.
Using our plugin, you are protected.

DISCLAIMER:

By installing the Alitools Download AliExpress Images & Videos Chrome extension, you accept the terms of the user agreement and allow redirecting you to the links of the affiliate program AliExpress.

The extension is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by Alibaba Group or any of the other marketplaces like aliexpress.com and alibaba.com
